list_definition.definition: a type of flat-bottomed boat with square ends, moved by pushing against the bottom of the river etc with a pole.

list_ex_of_english: Three of those ended with turnovers (2 fumbles, 1 interception), four ending with punts, one with a turnover on downs, and one touchdown.
He also returned five kickoffs for 77 yards, and two punts for 16 yards.
In that game he recorded three blocked punts, all of which occurred during the second quarter of the game.
He had 10 receptions for 106 yards and two touchdowns and returned two punts for 16 yards.
The first quarter went scoreless with both teams trading punts.
During his sophomore season, he played in all 11 games as the long snapper on punts while also recording four tackles on special teams.
Each team totaled 16 first downs, four punts, five penalties, and the margin in time of possession was less than a minute.
The club supports two traditional water sports - skiffing and punting.
